name: BLAP
description: BLAP is a vibrant fusion of the four Boys Club characters: Brett, Landwolf, Andy, and Pepe. Each member contributes their unique strengths—Brett’s chaos, Landwolf’s mysterious creativity, Andy’s bold ideas, and Pepe’s viral charm—resulting in a dynamic, unpredictable force. BLAP represents an extraordinary collaboration, capturing the essence of "Brett on Base" while continuing the Boys Club story through the creation of a new, collective character. This fusion redefines their legacy with a fresh, energized twist.
